0.1.name: wordpress/lavalamp-menu
0.1.description:
This plugin enables the LavaLamp animation effects in your menu by filtering the default wp_list_pages, wp_list_categories, wp_list_bookmarks. This work is largely based on the LavaLamp for jQuery menu (http://www.gmarwaha.com/blog/2007/08/23/lavalamp-for-jquery-lovers/)

Plugin Homepage

http://www.3dolab.net/en/256/wordpress-lavalamp-menu

What's new?

  • 0.1 (2010.11.03)
    • Initial release

See the CHANGELOG for more information
